text: Tsiroanomandidy is a city (commune urbaine) in central-western Madagascar, approximately 210 kilometres west of the capital Antananarivo. Tsiroanomandidy is the capital of Bongolava Region and of Tsiroanomandidy District and seat of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Tsiroanomandidy (Cathedral of Our Lady of Good Remedy). == Transports == There is an airport. ==Education== A regional centre for distance education (CRTE) of the Centre National de Télé-Enseignement de Madagascar (CNETMAD) is located in Tsiroanomandidy. == References== Category:Cities in Madagascar Category:Populated places in Bongolava Category:Regional capitals in Madagascar
title: Tsiroanomandidy
